TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSAEncryptionPadding extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding>

Docs.summary: Specifies the padding mode and parameters to use with RSA encryption or decryption operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding CreateOaep(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance whose <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> is with the given hash algorithm.
Docs.returns: An object whose mode is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> is with the hash algorithm specified by . .
Docs.exception: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A> property of is either or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified object.
Docs.returns: if is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj` is equal to the current instance if it is a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object and the two objects have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.

Docs.summary: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified object.
Docs.returns: if is equal to the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instance` and the current instance are equal if they have identical <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code of this object.
Docs.returns: The hash code of this instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the padding mode represented by this instance.

Gets the hash algorithm used in conjunction with the padding mode. If the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> property is not , <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is .
Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.
Docs.value: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA1 hash algorithm.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.
Docs.value: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA256 hash algorithm.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA-384 hash algorithm.
Docs.value: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA384 hash algorithm.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP) encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.
Docs.value: An object that represents the OAEP encryption standard with a SHA512 hash algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Two <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> objects are not equal if their <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.OaepHashAlgorithm%2A> property values are not equal.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the PKCS #1 encryption standard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the string representation of the current instance.
Docs.returns: The string representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string representation of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding> object is the concatenation of its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode%2A> and `OaepHashAlgorithm.Name` properties.
